title: CBT Mode ISA q
content: For the 2 and 4 markers, we can type a few questions on the computer and write a few on paper right?. Example q 1a typed and q1b written.

comments.body: Can we also do all on the computer and return the empty anwer script?
Generally yes, but every paper will have that one question, which is best to be written, rather than typed. In that way, no answer script would be blank. Maybe questions with diagrams, for ex
